verses.verse: And Samuel<WH8050> died;<WH4191> and all<WH3605> the Israelites<WH3478> were gathered<WH6908> together, and lamented<WH5594> him, and buried<WH6912> him in his house<WH1004> at Ramah.<WH7414> And David<WH1732> arose,<WH6965> and went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the wilderness<WH4057> of Paran.<WH6290>

Now<WH6258> the name<WH8034> of the man<WH376> was Nabal;<WH5037> and the name<WH8034> of his wife<WH802> Abigail:<WH26> and she was a woman<WH802> of good<WH2896> understanding,<WH7922> and of a beautiful<WH3303> countenance:<WH8389> but the man<WH376> was churlish<WH7186> and evil<WH7451> in his doings;<WH4611> and he was of the house<WH1004> of Caleb.<WH3612>

And now<WH6258> I have heard<WH8085> that you have shearers:<WH1494> now your shepherds<WH7462> which<WH834> were with us, we hurt<WH3637> them not, neither<WH3808> was there ought<WH3972> missing<WH6485> to them, all<WH3605> the while<WH3117> they were in Carmel.<WH3760>

So<WH3541> and more<WH3254> also<WH3541> do<WH6213> God<WH430> to the enemies<WH341> of David,<WH1732> if<WH518> I leave<WH7604> of all<WH3605> that pertain to him by the morning<WH1242> light<WH216> any that urinates<WH8366> against the wall.<WH7023>

And when Abigail<WH26> saw<WH7200> David,<WH1732> she hurried,<WH4116> and lighted<WH3381> off<WH5921> the ass,<WH2543> and fell<WH5307> before<WH639> David<WH1732> on<WH5921> her face,<WH6440> and bowed<WH7812> herself to the ground,<WH776>

Let not my lord,<WH113> I pray<WH4994> you, regard<WH3820> this<WH2088> man<WH376> of Belial,<WH1100> even Nabal:<WH5037> for as his name<WH8034> is, so<WH3651> is he; Nabal<WH5037> is his name,<WH8034> and folly<WH5039> is with him: but I your handmaid<WH519> saw<WH7200> not the young<WH5288> men of my lord,<WH113> whom<WH834> you did send.<WH7971>

Now<WH6258> therefore, my lord,<WH113> as the LORD<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> and as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> seeing the LORD<WH3068> has withheld<WH4513> you from coming<WH935> to shed blood,<WH1818> and from avenging<WH3467> yourself with your own hand,<WH3027> now<WH6258> let your enemies,<WH341> and they that seek<WH1245> evil<WH7451> to my lord,<WH113> be as Nabal.<WH5037>

And now<WH6258> this<WH2063> blessing<WH1293> which<WH834> your handmaid<WH8198> has brought<WH935> to my lord,<WH113> let it even be given<WH5414> to the young<WH5288> men that follow<WH1980> <WH7272> my lord.<WH113>

I pray<WH4994> you, forgive<WH5375> the trespass<WH6588> of your handmaid:<WH519> for the LORD<WH3068> will certainly make<WH6213> my lord<WH113> a sure<WH539> house;<WH1004> because<WH3588> my lord<WH113> fights<WH3898> the battles<WH4421> of the LORD,<WH3068> and evil<WH7451> has not been found<WH4672> in you all your days.<WH3117>

Yet a man<WH120> is risen<WH6965> to pursue<WH7291> you, and to seek<WH1245> your soul:<WH5315> but the soul<WH5315> of my lord<WH113> shall be bound<WH6887> in the bundle<WH6872> of life<WH2416> with the LORD<WH3068> your God;<WH430> and the souls<WH5315> of your enemies,<WH341> them shall he sling<WH7049> out, as out of the middle<WH8432> of a sling.<WH7050>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, when<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> shall have done<WH6213> to my lord<WH113> according to all<WH3605> the good<WH2896> that he has spoken<WH1696> concerning<WH5921> you, and shall have appointed<WH6680> you ruler<WH5057> over Israel;<WH3478>

That this<WH2063> shall be no<WH3808> grief<WH6330> to you, nor offense<WH4383> of heart<WH3820> to my lord,<WH136> either that you have shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818> causeless,<WH2600> or that my lord<WH136> has avenged<WH3467> himself: but when the LORD<WH3068> shall have dealt well<WH3190> with my lord,<WH113> then remember<WH2142> your handmaid.<WH519>
And David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Abigail,<WH26> Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> sent<WH7971> you this<WH2088> day<WH3117> to meet<WH7125> me:
